## Datasets

- **GFT: Group Formation Task Spontaneous Facial Expression Database** (2017)<br />
  A 2D video database of spontaneous behavior during unscripted social interactions<br />
  Complete with frame-level FACS annotations of facial behavior (n = 96)<br />
  *Primary Article/Citation:* <https://jmgirard.com/pubs/girard2017d/><br />
  *Website/Request Access:* <http://osf.io/7wcyz>
  
- **MMSE/BP4D+: Multimodal Spontaneous Emotion Database** (2016)<br />
  An extension of BP4D that includes thermal and physiological data<br />
  Complete with frame-level FACS annotations of facial behavior (n = 140)<br />
  *Primary Article/Citation:* <https://jmgirard.com/pubs/zhang2016/><br />
  *Website/Request Access:* <http://bit.ly/2yg39Cn>

- **BP4D: Binghamton-Pittsburgh 4D Spontaneous Emotion Database** (2014)<br />
  A 3D video database of spontaneous behavior during emotion elicitation<br />
  Complete with frame-level FACS annotations of facial behavior (n = 41)<br />
  *Primary Article/Citation:* <https://jmgirard.com/pubs/zhang2014/><br />
  *Website/Request Access:* <http://bit.ly/2yg39Cn>

## Software

### Maturing
- **lordicon** (2022)<br />
  Extension for adding lordicon.com icons to Quarto HTML documents<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/lordicon>
  
- **circumplex: Analysis and Visualization of Circumplex Data** (2017–2021)<br />
  R functions and educational materials about circumplex data analysis/visualization<br />
  *Documentation:* <https://circumplex.jmgirard.com><br />
  *Source Code:* <http://github.com/jmgirard/circumplex>

- **mReliability: Inter-rater Reliability in MATLAB** (2015–2018)<br />
  MATLAB functions and educational materials about inter-rater reliability<br />
  *Documentation:* <https://mreliability.jmgirard.com><br />
  *Source Code:* <http://github.com/jmgirard/mreliability>

- **DARMA: Dual Axis Rating and Media Annotation** (2014–2018)<br />
  Software for collecting and reviewing 2D continuous ratings of media files<br />
  *Documentation:* <https://darma.jmgirard.com><br />
  *Source Code:* <http://github.com/jmgirard/darma>
  
- **CARMA: Continuous Affect Rating and Media Annotation** (2014–2018)<br />
  Software for collecting and reviewing 1D continuous ratings of media files<br />
  *Documentation:* <https://carma.jmgirard.com><br />
  *Source Code:* <http://github.com/jmgirard/carma>
  
### Developing
- **varde** (2022)<br />
  R functions for decomposing variance in multilevel models<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/varde>
  
- **wcc** (2022)<br />
  R functions for windowed cross-correlation (synchrony) analyses<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/wcc>

- **profiles** (2022)<br />
  R functions and RStudio add-ins for managing RStudio profiles<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/profiles>

- **tidymedia** (2021–2022)<br />
  R functions for working with audio and video files in a tidy format<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/tidymedia>

- **agreement** (2018–2022)<br />
  R functions for inter-rater reliability<br />
  *Source Code:* <https://github.com/jmgirard/agreement>
